basics.name: Ervin Rácz
basics.label: Software Engineer (Java / Full Stack)
basics.summary: Software Engineer with ~6 YOE working on (FinTech & industrial) web applications. I love making system designs, putting complex algorithms and ideas into practice, and I am an advocate of TDD, Clean Architecture, and DDD.

work.name: Sitline and other companies as Freelancer
highlights: Single-handedly spearheaded the implementation of the backend infrastructure for Java microservices on Kubernetes, leveraging Helm charts. This involved architecting and setting up the entire infrastructure for the microservices, ensuring seamless deployment, scalability, development and management of the application.
Demonstrated expertise in designing both low-level and high-level system architectures, ensuring seamless data flow between multiple services.
Developed efficient Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) processes for on-prem solutions, enabling smooth data integration and processing.
Implemented parallel workflows, significantly reducing the processing time of large-scale data batches.
Optimized batch jobs by updating them for GraalVM, resulting in reduced package size and improved memory usage.
Successfully migrated Java processes and databases to AWS, resulting in a significant reduction of hosting costs by approximately 60%, while maintaining system functionality and performance.

work.name: Siemens Energy
work.summary: Worked on a web based operational platform designed for power plants:
highlights: Contributed to project setup process for a greenfield project, strategically defining agile processes and selecting optimal technologies to ensure project success.
Provided valuable coaching and guidance to the Product Owner (PO) in user story creation, road-map adjustments, and prioritization, leading to improved project alignment and execution.
Enforced the adoption of best practices, such as the "Feature / Vertical Stories" and "API Design First" approach, to maintain high-quality standards throughout development.
Successfully delivered core features of the application, meeting project milestones.
Designed and developed a collection of reusable UI components, including a modular data table with customizable features, enhancing code reusability and improving development efficiency.
Assumed the role of the main code reviewer for the FE across three different teams, ensuring code quality, adherence to coding standards, and fostering knowledge sharing among team members.

work.name: Bosch

Mentored and trained over 10 individuals, equipping them with the necessary skills and knowledge to navigate software development cycles.
Streamlined the development cycle and significantly enhanced team productivity by optimizing project setup.

Boosted the performance of multiple web application pages by 30-50% through data access optimization techniques such as JPA, SQL, and data model enhancements.
Conducted extensive interviews with more than 30 applicants during the seasonal recruitment process, ensuring the selection of technically capable junior team members.
